Line1.7FA05: Good news for once, I hope?
Line19.7FA05: He didn’t tell you? No. Of course not. That would require some basic degree of consideration.
Line21.7FA05: It’s written in our code. He sent a plan—though calling it that is generous. He wants to imprison Lilith with my soulstone—the one that held Astaroth.
Line29.7FA05: Certainly not! The stone needs to be attuned first. And he will need an expert for that.
Line31.BAE4: Lorath thinks that expert is you.
Line33.7FA05: Then he is even more foolish than I thought.
Line35.7FA05: Go to the Horadric Vault, will you? I’ll dig up what he needs. You can deliver it, and maybe then he’ll leave me alone.
MenuLabel: “I have a letter for you, Donan.”
